ygData.msgSnippet: Dear wizards, As i pased into new easier life as i get lv 24 and new DD spell (wich finaly dont fizzle :-) ) i started to visit a castle mistmore. This place
ygData.messageBody:
Dear wizards,

As i pased into new easier life as i get lv 24 and new DD spell (wich
finaly dont fizzle :-) ) i started to visit a castle mistmore. This place
is very interesting for solo and gruping wizard as there are many dark
elves at entrance wich are lv 20 - 24 and in god group is easy to get great
experience and a place is much less confusing then a Soulsek A or Unrest.

In group of 3 max 4 similar lv you can make a great experience if a puller
is ok and know when to pull and what to pull. Here i started to use my
first Area damage spells and im very happy with them.

Tactic: if a group pull 2 or 3 darkies i wait until they build some hate
against fighters and then i cast a Ligting storm on them. If casted in
right moment it will not make them agresive and i will do much more damage
then using only DD spels.

Example: Storm do Rain damage in 2 waves and i think sometimes 3 ..(when
raining ?) it hits for 75 damage and it is 2 waves * 2 targets * 75 a
whooping 300 damage for a 135 mana ! If it is 3 targets it is 450 damage
and i once get it on 4 targets for a 600 damage !! .. realy it is all time
a little bit less, becouse of partial od rarely full resists, but in any
case it is more damage then with any DD spell. (shock of this lv do 172 +3
for lv damage).

Trick is in right timing and god work with group. This tactic is very
useful if you are fighting many blues wich your fighters and healers can
handle without serious problems.

When i start to use this tactic i finaly start to understand what roule we
have in group and why wwe have so much AE spells. We are support
responsable for a mass damage and this is our PRIMARY role, (i think it
becouse we get 2 - 3 diferent AE spells for lv and only 1 maybe 2 DD for
lv) i know it is not what many of us thinked that role of wizard is but
Verant have many strange ideas :). ( i read much from high lv wizards that
they are useles in combat against capital monsters wich are resistent to
nearly all.. and if they get 3 full resists and 2 partial on Ice comet
things get bad... ( 2000 mana by by for cc.. 500 - 900 damage )


When im soloing i have start to use a tactic wich i found on boards...

Pulling with eye... Eye is nice thing to pull a mobs first they don get
agresive to it until it is realy near. and when they hit you can pull only
this room of monsters as target is already killed and they go after a
caster and passing near other monsters they DONT pull a train. so i can
pull with right use from Graveyard and still not get trained by all other
mobs in my way.

I hope that this helps my follow wizards and that i will se here some other
constructive tactics to use.

And lets hope that Verant finaly admit that there is something wrong with
wizards :-)


Silverion Dragonirder
